datafield.subfield: Description of resonant states in the shell model

A technique for describing scattering states within the nuclear shell model is proposed. This technique is applied to scattering of nucleons by particles based on ab initio No-Core Shell Model calculations of$^{5}$He and$^{5}$Li nuclei with JISP16 NN interaction.
